ygData.subject: Delayed Outcomes
ygData.msgSnippet: ooC: I ve got to get rid of some characters if i m going to avoid being totally overwhelmed by disipating intrest. I ve deceided to keep rping with Pacifix,

ooC: 

   I've got to get rid of some characters if i'm going to avoid 
being totally overwhelmed by disipating intrest. I've deceided to 
keep rping with Pacifix, Lynxiz, Switchblade, and Astrotrain. (maybe 
Crossroads as well).

   Azure, were you the last one to have characters who interacted 
with Pacifix? I'd like to know where Jer left him. Also, if anything 
happened to the decepticons that i didn't hear about i'd like to 
know about that as well. Last I can remember, everything was at a 
standstill. I've got a solution to the problem, and i was wondering 
if any decepitcons would mind. 

   Solution: As Switchblade will, while "fixing" megatron, 
disconnect his vocal abilities, and remove has ability to do 
anything except stay in pistol mode, and thus can only be used by 
another (Switchblade or, maybe Switchblade'll add Megs pistol onto 
Firestrike... hmmm). Soundwave will then have finished fixing 
Firestrike, and have both him and Nightstrike (and anyone else who 
is willing to follow Switchblade) dispatch any loyal followers of 
Megatron (ie. Soundwave, Laserbeak, Spasstik, Rumble, Frenzy, 
Stunticons, and anybody else that i might have missed, unless they 
agree to join Switchblade). 

   Then the decepticons will either need a leader, or join the NDE 
with the Dark Avian. If anyone wants any of the characters that will 
probably end up dying/coldstorage, speak up now.

   I'm also going to have to lighten the weight of the Autobots. 
That means i'll have to drop Swoop, The Technobots (i like em, just 
found i didn't like rping them), and maybe Crossroads. Haven't 
figured out how i'm going to do that, but it'll come to me 
eventually. 

   Anyone have any suggestions for stowing away my excess Chivitrons?
